description: IMO demo QA cases used by qa-imo and CLI IMO router tests

cases.prompt: For any positive integer n, give k so k*n has exactly 2024 prime factors.
Find all k in [1,50] such that ab+kc, ac+kb, bc+ka, ka+kb+kc has a perfect square for all a,b,c.
In sequence 1..99, does m_n/a_n differ from median(medians)?
What relation between ∠YPX and ∠KIL is verified?
In any 2-coloring of K6, what exists by R(3,3)=6?
Between f(x)=x and f(x)=2-x, which passes demo tests?
